Section.name: About Agni College of Technology
Section.description:
Agni College of Technology (ACT), Chennai, best Anna University affiliated Engineering College in Chennai, is ranked 38th out of 540 colleges in Tamil Nadu. The college has recently placed 188 students in top recruiting companies like Tata Consultancy Services, Health Watch Telediagnostics Pvt. Ltd., CSS Corp. Pvt. Ltd., Sutherland Global, IEQS, and Future General Total Insurance. The average salary package offered at ACT Chennai is INR 3 LPA and the highest salary package offered is up to INR 12 LPA.
Agni College of Technology, Chennai offers B.E. and B.Tech to Undergraduate, M.E., and M.Tech to Postgraduate, and PhD degrees to research students with various specializations in the streams of Engineering. ACT gives admission to students on the basis of merits in the qualifying exams and entrance exam scores. The cut off for admission falls around 4696-6970 for the TNEA.
Read More: Agni College of Technology Cut off
